text: Offenders () is a 2017 Serbian drama film directed by Dejan Zečević. It was selected as the Serbian entry for the Best Foreign Language Film at the 91st Academy Awards, but it was not nominated. ==Cast== * Radovan Vujović as Aleksandar * Mladen Sovilj as Danijel * Marta Bjelica as Teodora * Svetozar Cvetković as Professor Slavko Zurovac ==See also== * List of submissions to the 91st Academy Awards for Best Foreign Language Film * List of Serbian submissions for the Academy Award for Best Foreign Language Film ==References== ==External links== * Category:2017 films Category:2017 drama films Category:Serbian films Category:Serbian drama films Category:Serbian- language films Category:Films set in Belgrade Category:Films shot in Belgrade
title: Offenders
